name: Pasta #4
description:
1) Pasta is more important than the sauce, so each pasta deserves a special sauce for it.

2) Buy the best pasta you can find or if not, make it yourself.

3) Bring a large pot of water to boil because the more space the pasta has in the pot, the better and less sticky it will be.

4) Never run it under cold water! Transfer it to the pan where it will find its sauce and you will be happy.

5) And finally, feel every bite as a gift from Paradise, as an eternal offering from immemorial grandmothers so that we will always have a good plate of pasta on our table.
